item.title: Christus Santa Rosa Hospital San Antonio medical malpractice attorney/lawyer
item.description: As a medical malpractice attorney based in Houston, Texas, I handle lawsuits all over the State of Texas, including in the San Antonio area. Christus Santa Rosa Health System, in the San Antonio area The Christus Santa Rosa Health System is a division of Christus Health. It traces its roots to 1869, and, as a whole, has 1,159 licensed hospital beds and five full-service hospitals. The Christus Santa Rosa Health System includes The Children’s Hospital of San Antonio, Christus Santa Rosa Hospital Alamo Heights, Christus Santa Rosa Hospital Medical Center, Christus Santa Rosa Hospital New Braunfels, Christus Santa Rosa Hospital Westover Hills, Christus Santa Rosa Emergency Center Alon, Christus Santa Rosa Emergency Center Bandera, Christus Santa Rosa Emergency Center Creekside, Christus Transplant Institute, and Christus Santa Rosa Physicians Ambulatory Surgery Centers.
